textContent:
Unprocessed emotions, built up resentment, anger, frustration
- write down what comes up
- when do you feel this way,
- what need is unmet
- what past trauma is this bringing? 
- is this forgivable or not? 
- offer forgiveness or ask for forgiveness 
- write a letter?

Feeling like Gil's need to be alone to figure yourself out and not have the pressure of meeting Aaron's needs / risk disappointing him 

Feeling of attraction outside of relationship vs only in relationship (is this a sign of a problem or is this healthy) 

Are these all real problems or are these mirrors that make Gil feel uncomfortable bc she deep down doesn't feel worth it? 


ZEN IS THE WAY

If you seek wholeness outside of yourself you don't realize you are already whole. And when you realize you are already whole, you would be so happy and want to give it to everyone else, but you can't give it away bc everyone else has it. What you got to make them do is to see that they already have it and you don't give it to them and that's the most difficult task 

That's exactly what you and I are saying to each other. You first. Aaron you need to love yourself and I can't make you, but I can see you in your essence. Gil I see you in your wholeness and you don't feel whole but I can't make you whole. Only you can wake up to your wholeness. And when we do there is only pure love. No unhealthy attachments, codependency, longing or striving. Just two essence souls of the universe experiencing themselves and each other
title: Zen is the way
textContentHtml:
Unprocessed emotions, built up resentment, anger, frustration

- write down what comes up

- when do you feel this way,

- what need is unmet

- what past trauma is this bringing? 

- is this forgivable or not? 

- offer forgiveness or ask for forgiveness 

- write a letter?


Feeling like Gil's need to be alone to figure yourself out and not have the pressure of meeting Aaron's needs / risk disappointing him 


Feeling of attraction outside of relationship vs only in relationship (is this a sign of a problem or is this healthy) 


Are these all real problems or are these mirrors that make Gil feel uncomfortable bc she deep down doesn't feel worth it? 



ZEN IS THE WAY


If you seek wholeness outside of yourself you don't realize you are already whole. And when you realize you are already whole, you would be so happy and want to give it to everyone else, but you can't give it away bc everyone else has it. What you got to make them do is to see that they already have it and you don't give it to them and that's the most difficult task 


That's exactly what you and I are saying to each other. You first. Aaron you need to love yourself and I can't make you, but I can see you in your essence. Gil I see you in your wholeness and you don't feel whole but I can't make you whole. Only you can wake up to your wholeness. And when we do there is only pure love. No unhealthy attachments, codependency, longing or striving. Just two essence souls of the universe experiencing themselves and each other
